plot: In this hauntingly beautiful film, Rae drowns in a crisis of grief and loss until a five-year-old child unexpectedly interrupts her last desperate act, inspiring Rae to embrace life and living once more.
title: Grace
plot_es: In this hauntingly beautiful film, Rae drowns in a crisis of grief and loss until a five-year-old child unexpectedly interrupts her last desperate act, inspiring Rae to embrace life and living once more.
plot_en: In this hauntingly beautiful film, Rae drowns in a crisis of grief and loss until a five-year-old child unexpectedly interrupts her last desperate act, inspiring Rae to embrace life and living once more.
